channel.title: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]
channel.description:
[img]http://s21.postimg.org/nxfshtu5z/bannerbb_rsc.jpg[/img]
Sup RSC Fans! *This is under Some construction, Im in the process now of making it like kingpk, with the errors fixed, and all land and monsters added!* will keep adding more to the server... [img]http://s18.postimg.org/fhv1zznm1/screenshot7.png[/img]
[b]Info about Official Server[/b] *Economy based world. +Pking making a comeup! *All F2p and P2p skills working. *All F2p and P2p landscape. *Some Quests. *Wilderness pking will be f2p.(exception for certain days it will be p2p) *Staking enabled. *Rates- 8x All Skilling to make a very competitive Game.* [b]63x Boost in the wilderness for fighting stats![/b][i]including att,def,str,hits,range,prayer,mage[/i]
The Main purpose of this Server is to make sure skills, fighting, monsters, all that good stuff is balanced for an economy to work properly and still be able to PK without no lifing.
[b] To get Started First Register, Second get Client Download, and Third Create a Character on the left side of the Main Home.[/b] [url=http://bb-rsc.sytes.net]Click Here for forums![/url]
[b]Features[/b] *Highscores on website Main Home to compete. *Client re-sizing for player preference. *Batched skilling.(not all skills) *Zoom in and out. *Noloot command. *Up arrow chat storage. *Character Management with password changing, and personal pin number. *Info tab. *Combat calculator.
Righteous Market Place!
Thanks Everyone! Potential PS. yesterday night people already at the king black dragon! [img]http://s27.postimg.org/a3fhhov03/screenshot1.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @Varel Varel
item.description:
@Varel wrote:

Fun server, low players atm but the ones who do play are active. Join us it is fun and easy tp start off. If you devote time to it, in a few days you could have flatts.

item.title: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]
item.dc:creator: @potential_kilo potential kilo
item.description:
@potential_kilo wrote:

Dylan Bryl:

This server looks amazing!

thanks, can always make something better

inspectah:

Says my account cannot be loaded or some bs, up the rates or kiss the server goodbye. 1 person multilogging to make up the entire population with those rates… I can’t see this going anywhere tbh.

63xand up for all combat stats in the wild is great!
8-10x outside the wild for all skilling and combat stats for those wanting lower rates… This is the perfect balance.

Read full topic

item.title: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]
item.dc:creator: @potential_kilo potential kilo
item.description:
@potential_kilo wrote:

Artemis Wp:

Goodluck with your server matty !

Thanks man. Changes are being made to make the server a better balance of a server in my opinion.
Exp rates for combat stats only in the wilderness only will be 63x. Other possibilities are being looked at, and am looking for all opinions on our website to make the game a even better balance of economy and adding pking into the scene taking in consideration peoples lives without effecting the market much.

My thought is to add in some kingpk like things to the server, with keeping the whole world for people to play!

Read full topic
item.source: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]

item.title: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]
item.dc:creator: @K_zL K!zL
item.description:
@K_zL wrote:

First off I’ll say this. You were never suppose to get flats on RSC.

  1. 1x exp that never changes unless in wild to maybe 1.2x .

  2. Has an Auction House in Varrock.

  3. Has portals. (Not in wild)

  4. P2P side of wild is 24/7 P2P Pking. Mage Arena status.

  5. 1IP only auto 5 day ban when caught.

  6. No char parking in wild, when logged sends you to Edgeville.

  7. Can log while running in wild like real RSC.

~K!zL

Read full topic

item.title: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

Agility is now working!

also, there is 2x exp boost for combat stats in the wilderness until 2nd.

Everyone this is the Perfect chance to get a main going as this server is very new and still very competetive for skilling. Dont believe me just see the highscores.

Furthermore there is a missing feature forum for anything that is missing that should be working or suggestions you may have for the server!

see ya on BB-RSC

Read full topic
item.source: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]

item.title: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]
item.dc:creator: @potential_kilo potential kilo
item.description:
@potential_kilo wrote:

OP is now updated.

Thanks to all that are playing and have waited.

This server should bring back oldschool feel with pking of low level, and actually having to get magic to get around the world!

BB-RSC is much like original runescape classic game play.

-Potential

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @iBoss iBoss
item.description:
@iBoss wrote:

My goal was not to advertise, sorry if it looked that way. I am just wondering why people make new server instead of regrouping on the same. You said its to create new things. Guess its a valid reason. Good luck!

Read full topic

good luck but i dont see the point of releasing new servers when there rscrevolution out which is the most complete server with the best and most active staff team.

What you’re saying is, just because there are other servers, nobody is allowed to make another? Mate, people enjoy making things, i see your post as more of an advertisement anyways.

item.dc:creator: @potential_kilo potential kilo
item.description:
@potential_kilo wrote:

nacional:

What lothy said. Pick a target audience and go for it.

Thanks,
I have updated my OP as Economy will be the main focus of this Server.

[quote=“RSCRevolution, post:6, topic:537715”]Good luck!

The best tip i can give you is; whatever you do, stick with an idea and go for it. Dont let anything take you down and aim for that goal and reach it!

Have fun with this project.[/quote]
Thanks much bro and yes I like that advice as that is what I’ve been doing

Read full topic

item.title: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]
item.dc:creator: @potential_kilo potential kilo
item.description:
@potential_kilo wrote:

[quote=“Tim Dog, post:3, topic:537715”]matty failed to bring any server to success. thus this server will fail too, i am afraid. i wont play.

btw: i was kreator on all of matt’s servers and an active player. so if u cant keep ur existing players then how will you … :palm:[/quote]

This is not going to be easyrsc server, it is database and with a good source(moparclassic) there is a huge difference here.
Some of the Goods:

  • Character Management integrated with the website.
  • Highscores.
  • Account Security.
  • Tools

*There is endless possibilities with database servers, Once it comes you will see

Read full topic

item.title: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I hate to break it to you, but the Economy Staking Pking trifecta is a lot like the Sleep, Social Life, Good Grades trifecta that any university student is familiar with.
In short, choose two.

In a nutshell, pking and staking around the clock are unachievable in games that require considerable investment of time when it comes to acquisition of resources (i.e., games that focus on the economical side of things).

Read full topic

item.title: BB-RSC Server, New changes [Check it out! ]
item.dc:creator: @potential_kilo potential kilo
item.description:
@potential_kilo wrote:

Sup RSC Fans!
This is under Some construction, Im in the process now of making it like kingpk, with the errors fixed, and all land and monsters added! will keep adding more to the server…

Info about Official Server
*Economy based world. +Pking making a comeup!
*All F2p and P2p skills working.
*All F2p and P2p landscape.
*Some Quests.
*Wilderness pking will be f2p.(exception for certain days it will be p2p)
*Staking enabled.
Rates- 8x All Skilling to make a very competitive Game.
63x Boost in the wilderness for fighting stats!including att,def,str,hits,range,prayer,mage

 The Main purpose of this Server is to make sure skills, fighting, monsters, all that good stuff is balanced for an economy to work properly and still be able to PK without no lifing.

To get Started First Register, Second get Client Download, and Third Create a Character on the left side of the Main Home.
Click Here for forums!

Features
*Highscores on website Main Home to compete.
*Client re-sizing for player preference.
*Batched skilling.(not all skills)
*Zoom in and out.
*Noloot command.
*Up arrow chat storage.
*Character Management with password changing, and personal pin number.
*Info tab.
*Combat calculator.

Righteous Market Place!

Thanks Everyone!
Potential
PS. yesterday night people already at the king black dragon!

Read full topic
